General.Name: LM Funding America Inc
General.Description: LM Funding America, Inc. operates as a cryptocurrency mining and specialty finance company. It operates through two segments, Specialty Finance and Bitcoin Mining Operations. The company also engages in Bitcoin mining operations; and provides funding to nonprofit community associations. LM Funding America, Inc. was founded in 2008 and is based in Tampa, Florida.
General.Address: 1200 Platt Street, Tampa, FL, United States, 33602
